data.name: Nongünz
data.detailed_description:
NONGÜNZ IS OUT! THANK YOU!



Nongünz finally arrives at Steam!! It has been an intense way with a lot of people backing the game, giving Nongünz a lot of love, now we are very happy with the reception of the game, we love there are so much people discovering Nongünz secrets... Now it´s time to play it!!

The game has all the personality and crazy way of their devs @verz_edu (Producer, Game designer, Main Pixel Artist, and Creative Director) and @ezrubiera (Main Programmer), the music has all the charm and style of @beibeicoli.
We also want to thank all those people behind of the development:
Marcos a.k.a Muffin de Sepia (an insane level designer) Charly Santafé and Guille Laorga (lovely guys with magic on their hands) "our" Rafer Labarta (keep an eye on this promising guy!) Bakir Khawam a.k.a. Moha (the finnest pixel artist of Persia)
For all of you guys, our infinite LOVE <3

If you want to keep up to date, just follow us:

http://www.twitter.com/SindiecateArts
http://www.twitter.com/Brainwash_Gang
http://www.facebook.com/Sindiecate

We will be updating and very aware of every comment you made :)

Now is time to Nongünz!


Join our DISCORD!



Chat with Nongünz developers at the DISCORD group we´ve created.
You can discover the latest and exclusive info about Nongünz in our channel:

https://discord.gg/AUJPTV

NONGÜNZ is closer than ever...


This Friday...We NONGÜNZ!



The release date for Nongünz is really really near and the most early twitchers and youtubers have started to streaming our game.

You can see NONGÜNZ in action if you follow us or follow Brainwash Gang on Twitter and Facebook.

Also you can add this game to your wishlist NOW!!

SAVE THE DATE. MAY 19!!

http://www.twitter.com/SindiecateArts
http://www.twitter.com/Brainwash_Gang
http://www.facebook.com/sindiecate


About the Game

Nongünz is a nihilistic action platformer which combines hectic shootouts with the management of a mysterious idle game.

Each run will have you parting from a black and white graveyard into an ever-changing gothic dungeon full of nightmares fleshed out of human viscera. Surviving this distraught roguelike will not only require skill but style, since Nongünz rewards you for long-lasting combos and challenges... moreover, score will play a key role in the progress of the idle game: the formation of your very own band of lost souls and death cultists.

As the world of Nongünz evolves, you will meet special characters that will inhabit your graveyard: praying cultists, self-scourging martyrs, somber gravediggers... which will either help you widen your killing skills or improve the performance of the insidious idle game built around the graveyard.

Features
  • Unforgiving gameplay that will challenge both your skill and your wits.
  • The whole game is a riddle. Unveil the mystery behind the nihilistic universe of Nongünz.
  • Beautifully crafted black and white pixel environments and characters.
  • Hundreds of levels plagued with dozens of differents enemies.
  • Many weapons, items and equipment to unlock and master.
  • The potential to change your perception about existence, violence and mankind.

data.short_description: Nongünz is a nihilistic action platformer roguelike. Nongünz is obscure in both gameplay and theme. Nongünz is a riddle that demands sacrifice.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Bulgarian, Czech, Traditional Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Arabic
data.reviews:
“This game is wonderfully stylistic and showed a lot of promise”
Daily Mirror

“Nongünz is a hyper-stylized action platformer with some awesome art direction. It's also apparently tough as nails, drawing more than one comparison to Enter the Gungeon.”
PCGamer

“And it’s hard not to like a game where you’re building an undead band while also clearing out dungeons full of skeletal creatures.”
DualShockers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
